
====================
SetupEOSMicroBand
====================

.. currentmodule:: nucleardatapy.setupeosmicroband

.. Don't include inherited members to keep the doc short
.. automodule:: nucleardatapy.eos.setup_micro_band
	:members:

Here are a set of figures which are produced with the Python sample: /nucleardatapy_sample/plots/plot_eos_setupMicroBand.py

.. figure:: ../../../nucleardatapy_samples/plots/figs/plot_eos_setupMicroBand_NM.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band in NM obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016, QMC-2016 and MBPT-2020.

.. figure:: ../../../nucleardatapy_samples/plots/figs/plot_eos_setupMicroBand_SM.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band in SM obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016 and MBPT-2020.

.. figure:: ../../../nucleardatapy_samples/plots/figs/plot_eos_setupMicroBand_Esym.png
	:scale: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	Uncertainty band for the symmetry energy obtained from the analysis of different predictions: MBPT-2016 and MBPT-2020.
